item.description:
Dear meetup members,
Come to our next event on November 8th to celebrate our election victories and help us plan for our 2007 Environmental calendar! Also, find out about the important issues we are currently working on, like global warming and public transportation, and how your skills and interests can fit in and make our goals more reachable.

And of course, order a drink and satisfy your tastebuds with some complimentary appetizers made by Orleans' chef.

Hope you can make it and help close off the year's events with new energy and possiblities for the future!

group.name: Greater Boston Sierra Club Environmental Meetup Group

item.name: Post-Election Meetup
